nodes.text: Doctor Egamo was the "pyscho-assembler" at the Q'Maere Research Facility when it was controlled by Moff Kentor Sarne. Better suited to treating neurosis than reconfiguring personalities, Egamo constantly assessed other people's behavior. Slightly out of touch with the rest of the facility, Egamo would analyze himself when he was alone. He sported swept back salt and pepper hair.
